Class CommandLineBuilder

    CommandBuilder

    public abstract class CommandLineBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandBuilder
    Base class to build tokenized command lines.

      • tokens

        public java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> tokens()
        Description copied from interface: CommandBuilder
        Builds the sequence of tokens that make up the string representation of this command, e.g. (pseudo code) [java, -cp, my.jar:ur.jar, app.Main].
        Specified by:
        tokens in interface CommandBuilder
        Returns:
        the list of tokens that make up this argument string.
